name: Escape Legacy: Ancient Scrolls
description: New Adventure Escape Room Game with Full High Definition Resolution and High Detailed Graphics! First Person Character control with Realistic Gameplay! Can you Escape?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Duo Core Intel or Amd Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any with 1 Gb VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core Intel or Amd Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Any with 2 Gb VRAM DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Any
